mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.huiyuan_name as huiyuanName ,a.huiyuan_phone as huiyuanPhone ,a.huiyuan_id_number as huiyuanIdNumber ,a.huiyuan_photo as huiyuanPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.huiyuan_email as huiyuanEmail ,a.new_money as newMoney ,a.huiyuan_content as huiyuanContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM huiyuan a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.huiyuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.huiyuanName},'%')
and a.huiyuan_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.huiyuanPhone},'%')
and a.huiyuan_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.huiyuanIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.huiyuan_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.huiyuanEmail},'%')
and a.new_money >= #{params.newMoneyStart}
and a.new_money <= #{params.newMoneyEnd}
and a.huiyuan_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.huiyuanContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
